mdRecord.dcterms:title: Declaration of Independence: The unanimous Declaration of the thirteen United States of America
Unanimous Declaration of the thirteen United States of America
United States. Declaration of Independence
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 27 x 43 cm. folded to 27 x 22 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lithograph, script on p. [1] of folded sheet, with signatures in block letters; p. [2]-[4] blank. Text within a border of 13 state seals.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 1-3: Copy 1 is hand colored. Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: New York, New York (State), United States
